description: Add above-the-fold feature highlights for Portfolios, Community, Museums, and Exhibits; Portfolios CTA is sign-in when logged out. Remove Explore Exhibits and Learn more from hero overlay.
Add optional reference or inspiration image to submissions; editable in portfolio item form and visible on submission detail.
Refine homepage feature highlight cards: inline descriptions beside titles, use full-width outline buttons for CTAs, and shorten all copy for a cleaner layout.

Optimize mobile portfolio layout: dropdown menu with filters, icons before each filter type (lock for access, folder for categories, tag for tags), reduced spacing between title and breadcrumbs. Auto-close menu when filters are changed.
Mobile nav on creator and about pages always shows expanded bar (all items with icon and label) instead of minified bar; bottom bar stays pinned for an app-like experience.
